title: 求lwc附属 或lwc如何给展示框上锁
author: 黄瓜zz
txt_content: 1.12.2 展示框是实体了 上不了锁

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
黄瓜zz 发表于 2020-5-16 21:55
试过了 2333
Add ENTITYTYPE (in caps, unlike other blocks, which are in lower case) to core.yml under blocks.
全大写
ITEM_FRAME
  enabled: true

replies.author: wjwrh
replies.txt_content:
你在core.yml
protections:
  blocks:
后面加一个
item_frame
  enabled: true
试试？ 我看有人说好像可以直接锁物品展示框

replies.txt_content:
